Description.Text: Hayall is an elegant 4-star hotel offering refined accommodation in the heart of Kazan. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, gym, sauna, 24-hour onsite dining, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to Ploshchad Tukaya metro station and tram stop. Kazan is built on the intersection of two rivers and showcases a wealth of culture and history. Nearby places of interest include the Kazan Kremlin, All Religions Temple and Epiphany Church. Ploshchad Tukaya metro station and tram stop are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Kazan destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building with a smart facade. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, gym and a sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 23-25sqm and decorated in an elegant style with light colours. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, safe and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The 24-hour restaurant offers Russian cuisine in a modern dining room, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the adjoining bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
